column4: Newbie needs help, I cant logon to my Ubuntu (only Failsafe Terminal ) got this Error http://pastebin.com/379718 Any suggestions appreciated.
delete your ~/.ICEauthority and log in again
I deleted "~/.ICEauthority" file but still cant log on to my desktop. Determinist,  what u mean by "look under /etc/X11/ for xorg.conf~" I am a newbie need explicit help,  thx guys
